title: Competitive Diving Men and Women Fundamentals of Diving
brief_description: Using simple language and thorough examples this video looks at the three fundamentals of diving: Approach & Takeoff, Flight & Execution and Entry. Within these categories the Forward Approach Hurdle and Back Takeoff; Tuck, Pike and Straight Positions; Tower Approach and Takeoff, are examined.
